short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your newtab now has the latest stock market prices!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track the biggest companies' stock to plan your investment!
With Stocks Manager you'll be able to get stock's charts in the newtab.
Checking the weekly movements of leader companies such as Tesla, Apple and Microsoft, you can choose where to invest your money.
It's the perfect tool to start trading keeping everything under control or to study how the market works, in order to make wise decisions. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "Stocks Manager" Chrome extension and setting ChromeTM new tab search to that provided by Microsoft BING as the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://stocksmanager.xyz/privacy
TOS: https://stocksmanager.xyz/tos
About: https://stocksmanager.xyz/about
